thread.title: Chelsea sign goalkeeper Marco Amelia as cover for Asmir Begovic
thread.title_full: Chelsea sign goalkeeper Marco Amelia as cover for Asmir Begovic

title: Chelsea sign goalkeeper Marco Amelia as cover for Asmir Begovic
text:
Chelsea sign goalkeeper Marco Amelia as cover for Asmir Begovic 08 Oct 2015 16:31:57 
comments 
Chelsea have signed goalkeeper Marco Amelia on a free transfer. 
Boss Jose Mourinho has drafted in the 33-year-old free agent as cover for Asmir Begovic, with first-choice Thibaut Courtois currently out injured. 
Amelia has agreed a contract until the end of the season and will be available for the Blues when they return to Premier League action against Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge a week on Saturday. Related Sport News
